channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: This bin is often overflowing, 1st July
item.description:
Could it be emptied more often please

item.title: Fly tipping and abandoned wheelie bins, 1st July
item.description:
This corner of Norcroft Gardens always gets flytipped, currently full of rubbish, abandoned shopping trolley and two wheelie bins.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Norcroft Gardens, East Dulwich, London

item.title: Fly tipping, 1st July
item.description:
Fly tipping, in the same place again, it’s every week now. It seems to be a regular dumping place for fly tippers. Greenwich council.Please put signage up which might deter further dumping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alnwick Road, Horn Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corpse removed - foul smell, 1st July
item.description:
A decomposing corpse was removed form flat 5, 113 britannia walk last night by authorities but the building smells foul and is in need of urgent specialised cleaning urgently
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Britannia Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rain drain cover missing, 1st July
item.description:
A rain drain gulley on the roundabout has become dislodged and the gulley is exposed and cars could become really damaged if driven over and cause a serious accident
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken toilet door, 1st July
item.description:
Dissused gent's toilet in Priestlands Rec. Door is open, presumably vandalism.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Recreation Road, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bins and rats, 1st July
item.description:
These bins are against my garden wall. My garden is now full of rats. Kids live upstairs. These bins need moving so they’re not treated as a public dump, or emptying more than once a week as they’re a health hazard - especially in 32 degree heat.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish bags dumped outside new Quebec street, 1st July
item.description:
There are 4 rubbish bags dumped outside Roketsu at New Quebec Street. The seagle scattering the waste all over pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, New Quebec Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The verges are filled with litter, 1st July
item.description:
Please clean the verges along the cycle highway - looks disgusting, cleaned once a year

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jamaica Road, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Car hasn’t been moved for years., 1st July
item.description:
This car has been in the public parking area for years. It has not moved. The car has so many parts missing it’s not drivable at all.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thamesbank Place, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missed food bin collection, 1st July
item.description:
It’s now the second week in a row that our food bin is not collected. The location is 20a Bishopsthorpe Road (on Kingsthorpe Rd side entrance) SE26 4NY. It’s now full and smells in this heat.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsthorpe Road, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping in Foxhole Rd, 1st July
item.description:
Yet again more fly tipping in Foxhole Road. Please at least put up a dummy camera and some signage to at least to try to deter fly tippers. This problem just goes on and on.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Foxhole Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Where indicated, 1st July
item.description:
Huge tree branch which is not (I don't think) part of the tree that is there. Not sure if this qualifies as flytip but someone has dumped this branch here Thank you
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
